meanings.definition: A person who competes in races.
meanings.sent1: The racers lined up at the starting line, eager to begin the race.
meanings.sent2: The racers trained hard to improve their speed and endurance.
meanings.sent3: The racers joked and laughed together before the competition, trying to ease their nerves.
meanings.sent4: In the world of racing, the racers are like warriors on the track, battling for victory.
meanings.sent5: The determined racers sprinted towards the finish line, giving it their all.
